TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PeerHopCountAttribute extends System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute

Docs.summary: Specifies the peer hop count member of a SOAP message header block.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the URI that indicates the node at which this header is targeted.
Docs.value: <xref:System.String> value that contains the name of the actor node at which this header value is targeted.
Docs.returns: <xref:System.String> value that contains the name of the actor node at which this header value is targeted.

Docs.summary: Specifies whether the node acting in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerHopCountAttribute.Actor%2A> role must understand this header.
Docs.value: True if the node acting in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerHopCountAttribute.Actor%2A> role must understand this header; otherwise, false.
Docs.returns: True if the node acting in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerHopCountAttribute.Actor%2A> role must understand this header; otherwise, false.

Docs.summary: Specifies the name of the element that corresponds to the peer hop count member.
Docs.value: <xref:System.String> value that contains the names of the XML element in the SOAP message that corresponds to the peer hop count.
Docs.returns: <xref:System.String> value that contains the names of the XML element in the SOAP message that corresponds to the peer hop count.

Docs.summary: Gets the namespace of the element that corresponds to the peer hop count member.
Docs.value: <xref:System.String> value that contains the namespace of the XML element in the SOAP message that corresponds to the peer hop count.
Docs.returns: <xref:System.String> value that contains the namespace of the XML element in the SOAP message that corresponds to the peer hop count.

Docs.summary: Gets whether the peer hop count member is to be transmitted as-is, signed, or signed and encrypted.
Docs.value: enumeration value that indicates the security protection level. The default value is .
Docs.returns: enumeration value that indicates the security protection level. The default value is .

Docs.summary: Gets whether this peer hop count is relayed to downstream nodes.
Docs.value: True if the peer hop count is relayed to downstream nodes; false if it is not.
Docs.returns: True if the peer hop count is relayed to downstream nodes; false if it is not.
